content.text:
# National Olympic Committee of the Republic of Uzbekistan

}}
The National Olympic Committee of the Republic of Uzbekistan (Latinised-) is the National Olympic Committee representing Uzbekistan. It was founded in the year of 1992, although it was not recognised by the International Olympic Committee until 1 January 1993. The headquarters of the committee is in the capital city of Tashkent. The incumbent president of the national committee is Rustam Shoabdurahmonov.
